news.title: Purpose Investments Inc. Announces July 2025 Distributions
news.summary: TORONTO, July 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Purpose Investments Inc. (“Purpose”) is pleased to announce distributions for the month of July 2025 for its open-end exchange traded funds and closed-end funds (“the Funds”).
